sentences.en: "How are you, mate?" — "Not bad, mate, how's yourself?"
sentences.cn: “最近怎么样，老兄？”——“还不错，你呢？”

sentences.en: Come on mate, things aren't that bad.
sentences.cn: 别灰心，兄弟，事情没那么糟。

sentences.en: Dad’s office mates are throwing a party for him.
sentences.cn: 爸爸的同事要为他办个聚会。

sentences.en: He has found his ideal mate.
He worked as a bricklayer's mate.
I will not mate with him.
Kathy is a great mate, we are like sisters.
sentences.cn: 凯茜是个很好的伙伴，我们亲如姐妹。

sentences.en: Last Saturday, I was out on the town with my mate.
sentences.cn: 上个星期六我和老友晚上去闹市玩乐了。

sentences.en: Murphy, Sinclair's young team-mate, was fractionally behind him.
sentences.cn: 辛克莱的年轻队友墨菲紧跟在他后面。

sentences.en: Rabbits can be mated as early as six months old.
sentences.cn: 兔子在六个月大时就可以交配了。

sentences.en: She has been a faithful mate to him.
sentences.cn: 她一直是他忠实的配偶.

sentences.en: The approxi-mate cost varies from around £150 to £250.
sentences.cn: 费用大概介于150至250英镑之间。

sentences.en: The mate is one rank below the captain.
sentences.cn: 大副是仅低于船长的头衔.

sentences.en: The presidential nominee was advised to choose a woman as a running mate.
sentences.cn: 有人建议总统候选人找一位女性竞选伙伴。

sentences.en: Where is the mate to this glove?
sentences.cn: 这副手套的另一只在哪儿?

sentences.en: You want to look where you're going, mate.
sentences.cn: 伙计，你应当看看你要去哪里。

words.tran_cn: （动物等的）交配，交尾；配套；（植物等的）杂交
交配；使配对；使紧密配合（mate的现在分词）
助手，大副；[生物]配偶；同事；配对物

phrases.tran_cn: 走第二步棋时白方就被黑方将死的败局
走第四步棋时白方用后和王象把黑方将死的棋局
情人；性情相投的人；心心相印的伙伴

trans.tran_cn: （工人间的）伙伴，同事，老兄，老弟〔工人，水手间的亲密称呼〕，配偶〔男女任何一方〕，动物之偶（尤指鸟类），（一对中的）一只，配对物，[医学]（军医等的）助手，[航海]（商船的）大副，驾驶员
trans.tran_en: used as a friendly way to address a man
if animals mate, they have sex to produce babies

trans.tran_cn: （使）成为配偶，（使）交配，（一对动物或鸟）交配，交尾(~ with sth)
